isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLES: SPICER J400-S, W460-S - INSTALL - DIFFERENTIAL

step1.para: The W Model carriers use three different differential cases, depending on the ratio. Two of the cases have two oil pick-up plates attached. Clean and coat bolts with Loctite Lock N Seal (red) or its equivalent. Assemble and tighten bolts to 7 to 9 ft-lbs. (9 to 12 Nm) ( Figure 126).
Install ring gear and differential assembly into carrier housing. Tilt differential slightly so ring gear clears straddle bearing support ( Figure 127).

figure.caption: Figure 126. Install Ring Gear and Differential Assembly into Carrier Housing

caution.para: Care should be used when installing ring gear and differential into carrier housing so damage to ring gear, pinion, bearings, or bearing bores does not occur.

step1.para: Be sure side bearing cups are seated on bearing cones. Assemble differential bearing caps, with match marks in proper location. Clean bearing cap bolts and washers and coat threads with Loctite #277 (red) or its equivalent. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION AND SEALER in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual. Install bearing cap bolts and tighten enough to eliminate visible space between differential bearing cap and carrier. Do not tighten at this time.
Install adjusting rings. Tighten both adjusting rings until end play is eliminated, and there is backlash between ring gear and pinion.

Loosen adjusting ring on tooth side of ring gear, and tighten adjusting ring on flange side of ring gear, equal amounts until backlash is eliminated. Tighten adjusting ring on tooth side of ring gear 2 to 3 notches or until proper backlash and side bearing preload are established ( Figure 128).
Check ring gear and pinion backlash in four equally spaced positions around the ring gear with dial indicator ( Figure 129).

figure.caption: Figure 128. Check Ring Gear and Pinion Backlash

note.para: If the backlash tolerance does not vary more than .003 inch 0 mm), the setting is acceptable. If backlash does vary more than .003 inch (.080 mm), remove differential and determine the cause.

step1.para: Once backlash is set, tighten the differential bearing cap bolts to 275 to 320 ft-lbs. (373 to 434 Nm). Check backlash after tightening cap bolts ( Figure 130).

figure.caption: Figure 129. Tighten Differential Bearing Cap Bolts
